Russia & CIS Energy Daily№ 229(6312) from 12/5/2023 #cis #russia #emergingmarkets #kazakhstan #oil #gas #equityresearch #fixedincome #portfoliomanager KazMunayGas puts East Urikhtau oil and gas field in Aktobe region commercially on streamASTANA. Dec 4 (Interfax) - KazMunayGas has put the East Urikhtau field in Kazakhstan's Aktobe region commercially in stream, Kazakhstan's national oil and gas company said in a press release. "Oil production in Eastern Urikhtau is expected to amount to 89,000 tonnes of oil and about 46 million cubic meters of gas in 2024. As mature oil and gas fields become depleted, the commissioning of this field is of particular importance in terms of increasing hydrocarbon resources to ensure the country's energy security," KMG said.

Mari Petroleum Company has made a significant contribution to Pakistan's energy sector by integrating new gas reserves from five wells in Sindh into the national gas network. This addition of 3 million metric standard cubic feet per day (MMSCFD) of gas from the Ghazij Gas Field is now being supplied to Sui Northern Gas Pipelines Limited (SNGPL). The company has successfully completed testing and production, paving the way for a comprehensive development plan for the Ghazij Gas Field. This plan will soon be submitted to the Oil and Gas Regulatory Authority (OGRA) for approval. This development is expected to strengthen Pakistan's gas supply and enhance energy security. The integration of new gas reserves is a positive step towards meeting the country's growing energy demands. . . . #GasReserves #PakistanEnergy #MariPetroleum #SNGPL #EnergySecurity #tribunetrends

--Company Update-- Pennpetro Energy PLC announces that oil production more than doubles from their Chalk Talk 1H Well, Texas. Highlights: - Optimisation of PPP's Chalk Talk #1H well in Texas sees oil production more than double in the past week of testing. - Oil production has increased to an avg 248 bopd in the last 6 days. - The previous week's oil production averaged 113 bopd. Tom Evans, Pennpetro Energy's CEO says: "The results of the oil production from our CT1H well test are excellent. We continue to optimize the performance of this well some 20 days into testing. We are still seeing a generally increasing trend in our daily oil production, which is certainly highly encouraging. Extended well testing continues." Indraprastha Gas Q1 FY25 Analysis: Key takeaways!! . . Indraprastha Gas Limited demonstrated resilient performance in Q1 FY25, with overall sales volume increasing by 5% year-on-year to 786 million standard cubic meters. The company is targeting an exit rate of 9.5 MMSCMD by the end of FY25, up from 8.64 MMSCMD in Q1. Management expects 10-12% volume growth over the next 5-6 years, driven by expansion in new geographical areas (GAs) and entry into the LNG retail business. Thank you Hydrogen Intelligence - H2lligence for sharing and @George Etomi & Partners fir publishing. Nigeria has enormous potential to become a regional leader in green hydrogen production. Despite lagging behind other African countries, Nigeria has a robust gas distribution infrastructure and experience in the renewable energy sector, making it well-positioned to accelerate its movement towards utility-scale infrastructure for green hydrogen production. With the country's large oil and gas industry, Nigeria could potentially enter the green hydrogen sector after making entry into blue hydrogen. The explosive growth of dialogues, workshops, and discussions on green hydrogen in Nigeria since early 2023 is a promising sign of the country's readiness for this transition. Let's keep our eyes on Nigeria's potential for green hydrogen production and regional leadership. #GreenHydrogen #RenewableEnergy #Nigeria #Sustainability

Also, the announcements on the current state of technology in the energy industry were very useful." - Senior Project Management, Crescent Petroleum, UAE This 2.5-day interactive computer-based training course provides participants with an intimate knowledge of petroleum upstream fiscal systems. At the same time, the rapid current developments in energy transition requires significant attention to this issue. Therefore, the participants will learn the impact of renewable resources and hydrogen on the petroleum industry and structuring of new petroleum-energy arrangements. Participants will gain a thorough understanding of the nature and details of all important fiscal features in the world and the wide variety of fiscal systems, based on concessions, production-sharing contracts, joint ventures, service contracts and other arrangements. The participants will learn the underlying economic characteristics of the various fiscal systems and advanced economic analysis. What you will learn: • Understand how government policies impact on fiscal systems • Learn how to analyse individual fiscal features and overall fiscal terms for an upstream project • Have a comprehensive insight into how energy transition is impacting on petroleum concessions and contracts and fiscal terms To know more about the training course - https://lnkd.in/gUvYX2YG #petroleum #petroleumindustry #petroedge #petroleumengineering #petrochemicalindustry #oilgas #oilandgas #oilfield #oilandgasindustry #oilindustry #oilandgascompanies #oilpatch #oilfieldservices #oilandgasservices #oilpatch #energy #energytransition #oilandgasindustry #oil
